text: Feliciano Brizuela Baez (born 17 July 1996) is a Paraguayan footballer who plays as a right winger for Club Sportivo San Lorenzo. ==Club career== ===3 de Febrero=== Throughout the 2018 season, Brizuela played 41 of 44 matches and went on to score six goals for 3 de Febrero. On 8 February 2019 it was confirmed, that he had been loaned out to Brazilian Campeonato Brasileiro Série A club Avaí FC for the 2019 season.Seguirá jugando en el competitivo fútbol brasileño, hoy.com.py, 8 February 2018 Brizuela helped Avaí winning the Campeonato Catarinense, playing 10 games, 6 from start and 4 as a substitute, and also scored two goals.Brizuela es campión en Brasil, 22 April 2019 He also played four games in the Campeonato Brasileiro Série A and one game in the Copa do Brasil. Brizuela returned to 3 de Febrero in November 2019.RETORNA! El delantero, Feliciano “Peta”... - Club Atlético 3 de ..., facebook.com, 6 November 2019 ===San Lorenzo=== In January 2020, Brizuela signed for Club Sportivo San Lorenzo.Olimpia adquiere ficha de Luis Cáceres y Feliciano Brizuela, rdn.com.py, 5 January 2020 He got his debut on 17 January 2020 against Club Guaraní. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Association football wingers Category:Paraguayan footballers Category:Paraguayan expatriate footballers Category:Paraguayan Primera División players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Club Atlético 3 de Febrero players Category:Avaí FC players Category:Club Sportivo San Lorenzo footballers Category:Paraguayan expatriate sportspeople in Brazil Category:Expatriate footballers in Brazil
title: Feliciano Brizuela
